prompts: Write me a love poem for my girlfriend's birthday. We've been together for 2 years and I want to tell her how much she means to me. Include something about her beautiful smile and how she makes every day brighter.
I need a short romantic poem for a valentine's day card!! something sweet but not too cheesy please

Can you help me write a love poem for my wedding vows? I want it to rhyme and talk about growing old together, facing life's challenges as a team, and how my partner is my best friend. About 8-10 lines would be perfect.

compose a poem about falling in love for the first time. make it capture that nervous, exciting feeling when you realize you're developing feelings for someone. maybe include metaphors about butterflies or springtime?
Write a haiku about cherry blossoms falling in spring
Can you create a haiku that captures the feeling of autumn leaves changing colors? I'd like something that really evokes that crisp fall atmosphere.
i need a haiku about winter snow please make it peaceful
Hey! Could you help me write a traditional haiku about a summer thunderstorm? I'm trying to capture that moment right before the rain starts falling. Thanks!
Write me a Shakespearean sonnet about the changing seasons, making sure to follow the proper ABAB CDCD EFEF GG rhyme scheme and iambic pentameter
Can you create a traditional English sonnet with 14 lines about unrequited love? Please stick to the classic structure with three quatrains and a closing couplet.
I need a sonnet in the Petrarchan style (ABBAABBA CDECDE) about the beauty of the ocean at sunset. Make sure it has the proper volta between the octave and sestet!
compose a sonnet about technology and modern life... should be 14 lines with proper meter and rhyme scheme like shakespeare would have written
Write a free verse poem about the feeling of loneliness after a breakup. I want it to capture that empty feeling when you wake up and realize they're not there anymore.
Can you help me create a free verse poem expressing my anxiety about the future? I'm feeling overwhelmed about career choices and want something that reflects that uncertainty and fear
i need a free verse poem about grief... my grandmother passed away last month and i'm struggling to process all these emotions. something raw and honest please
Generate a free verse poem that captures the bittersweet joy of watching your children grow up and become independent. Include imagery about time passing too quickly and the mix of pride and sadness.
Write me a funny limerick about a cat who thinks it's a dog
I need a limerick for my friend's birthday card. Make it silly and include something about him always being late to everything!
Can you come up with a humorous limerick about working from home? Something about zoom calls would be perfect lol
create a limerick that makes fun of how addicted people are to their phones. make it witty but not mean-spirited
Write a funny birthday poem for my dad who's turning 60. He loves golf and always makes dad jokes
I need a short and sweet birthday poem for a 5 year old girl who loves unicorns and rainbows! Make it rhyme please

Can you help me write a heartfelt 21st birthday poem for my best friend? We've known each other since middle school and she's always been there for me through thick and thin. I want to express how much our friendship means to me.
compose a birthday haiku for my coworker
Can you write a poem for my grandmother's funeral? She loved gardening and always had fresh flowers in her house. She passed away peacefully at 92 and was the kindest person I knew.

I need help writing a memorial poem for my dog Max who passed away yesterday. He was a golden retriever who loved swimming and was my best friend for 12 years. Something that captures how much joy he brought to our family.

Write a eulogy poem that I can read at my father's memorial service next week. He was a veteran, loved fishing, and taught high school history for 30 years. I want it to be respectful but also capture his sense of humor.

could you create a short remembrance poem for my friend who died in a car accident? we're doing a candlelight vigil and i want to read something meaningful. she was only 24 and loved music and traveling
Write a nursery rhyme about a little mouse who loves to eat cheese but keeps getting chased by a cat
Can you create a fun children's rhyme with the same rhythm as 'Twinkle Twinkle Little Star' but about a rainbow? I need it for my preschool class tomorrow.
I need a simple nursery rhyme about brushing teeth that I can teach to my 3 year old. Make it catchy with easy words please!
Generate a modern version of Humpty Dumpty where he doesn't break and instead learns to be more careful. Keep it in the traditional nursery rhyme style though
Can you write an acrostic poem using the name SOPHIA? I want to give it to my daughter for her birthday
I need help creating an acrostic poem with the word COURAGE for my english class assignment. Make it inspiring please!
Write me an acrostic using MICHAEL - something romantic I can put in a valentine's card for my boyfriend :)
hey could u make an acrostic poem with RAINBOW? my kid is learning about them in school and i thought this would be fun
Can you write a romantic poem I can read during my sister's wedding ceremony? Something about two souls becoming one and the journey of love would be perfect. Maybe 3-4 stanzas?

I need a short, heartfelt poem for my best friend's wedding toast. It should mention their names (Sarah and Michael) and include something about how they met at a coffee shop. Keep it under 12 lines please!
Write me a beautiful wedding ceremony poem that incorporates nature imagery like roses, sunshine, and ocean waves. I want to use it for the unity candle lighting portion of the ceremony

help me with a poem for my daughter's wedding day that I can read as the father of the bride. I want it to be emotional but not too sappy, maybe something about watching her grow up and now starting her own family. Around 16-20 lines would be good
Write a haiku about my cat who loves to knock things off the table
Can you create a funny limerick about a dog who refuses to go for walks when it's raining? Make it rhyme properly please
I need a short poem about saying goodbye to a beloved pet hamster. Something gentle and comforting for a child who just lost their pet.
write me a free verse poem about watching birds at my backyard feeder in the morning. i want it to capture that peaceful feeling of having coffee and seeing all the different species come and go
Write a poem about the melting polar ice caps and how it affects the wildlife there
Can you create a haiku about plastic pollution in the ocean? I want something simple but impactful.

I need a powerful spoken word poem about climate change for a school presentation. Make it about 20 lines long and include imagery about rising temperatures, extreme weather, and the urgency of taking action now. The tone should be both alarming and hopeful.
compose a short rhyming poem from the perspective of mother earth watching humans destroy the environment
Write a poem about the final seconds of a basketball game where the underdog team makes the winning shot
I need a haiku about swimming in the Olympics
Can you create a motivational poem about a marathon runner who's struggling at mile 20 but refuses to give up? Make it rhyme and really capture that mental battle between body and mind
write me a short poem celebrating a soccer team's victory. something with energy and rhythm that captures the excitement of the crowd and players
Write me a haiku about the smell of freshly baked bread
Can you create a funny limerick about someone who burnt their pasta? Make it lighthearted and silly!
I need a romantic poem about cooking dinner together with someone special. Maybe 8-10 lines, something that captures the intimacy of sharing a kitchen and creating something together.

compose a short free verse poem about the chaos of thanksgiving dinner prep... all the different dishes cooking at once, family members bumping into each other in the kitchen, the timer going off, etc. really capture that hectic energy
Write a poem about backpacking through the mountains, capturing the feeling of reaching a summit at sunrise
I need a short, rhyming poem about a road trip across America. Make it nostalgic and mention old diners, endless highways, and discovering small towns.
Can you create a haiku series (maybe 3-4 haikus) about traveling alone through Japan during cherry blossom season?
compose a free verse poem about the adventure of sailing across the ocean for the first time - include the fear, excitement, and how small you feel against the vast sea
Write a haiku about Tokyo during cherry blossom season
I need a poem about Paris that captures the feeling of walking along the Seine at sunset. Make it romantic and use some imagery about the lights and bridges.
Can you create a short verse about New York City? Something that shows both the chaos and the beauty of it
compose a nostalgic poem about returning to my hometown of Dublin after being away for years. include references to the river liffey and temple bar area
Write a poem about the daily grind of working in an office cubicle, capturing the monotony but also the small moments of hope
I need a motivational poem about climbing the corporate ladder and staying ambitious despite setbacks. Make it rhyme and keep it under 12 lines.
can you create a haiku about burnout from working too much overtime

Hey! I'm retiring after 30 years as a teacher and want to give a speech at my farewell party. Could you write a reflective, heartfelt poem about the journey of teaching - the challenges, the rewards, watching students grow, and passing the torch to the next generation? Make it emotional but uplifting, maybe 4-5 stanzas?

Can you write a poem about my best friend? We've known each other since kindergarten and she's always there for me when I need her. I want something that captures how grateful I am for her presence in my life.
I need a short friendship poem for my buddy's birthday card. Something fun and lighthearted that shows how much our friendship means to me, maybe 8-10 lines?
Write me a heartfelt poem about the beauty of true friendship. Include themes of loyalty, shared memories, and growing together through life's ups and downs.
hey can u help me write a poem to thank my friend group? we've been through so much together this year and i want to express how much they all mean to me. make it emotional but not too cheesy please
Write a Christmas poem about a family gathering around the fireplace, with snow falling outside. Make it warm and nostalgic.
I need a short Halloween poem for kids that's spooky but not too scary. Include witches, pumpkins, and trick-or-treating!
Can you create a Thanksgiving haiku? I want something simple and grateful
compose a valentine's day poem that's funny and slightly sarcastic for someone who thinks the holiday is too commercialized... but still wants to celebrate with their partner anyway lol
Write a poem about a teenager realizing they're becoming more like their parents, capturing that bittersweet moment of growing up
I need a short poem about leaving childhood behind. Make it nostalgic but hopeful, maybe mentioning old toys or games that no longer feel the same.
can you create a coming of age poem from the perspective of someone looking back at their 18th birthday? include imagery about crossing thresholds or doorways

Generate a free verse poem about the awkward middle school years - that weird time when you're not a kid anymore but not quite a teenager either. Include something about voice changes, growth spurts, or first crushes
Write a poem inspired by Van Gogh's Starry Night. I want it to capture that swirling, dreamlike quality of the painting with lots of imagery about the night sky and the village below.
Can you create a haiku based on The Great Wave off Kanagawa by Hokusai? Try to capture the power and beauty of the wave in just three lines.
I need a sonnet about Edward Hopper's Nighthawks. Focus on the loneliness and isolation of the late-night diner scene, maybe from the perspective of one of the customers sitting at the counter.
hey could u write me a free verse poem about the girl with a pearl earring painting?? i love how mysterious she looks and want something that explores who she might have been
Write a powerful poem about the Black Lives Matter movement that captures both the pain of injustice and the hope for change
Can you create a short poem about climate activism? I want something that would inspire young people to take action and speaks to the urgency of the crisis we're facing.
I need a spoken word style poem about immigrant rights and the struggles faced by undocumented families. Make it emotional and raw, something that could be performed at a rally
write me a poem about women's rights throughout history. include references to suffragettes, reproductive freedom, and the ongoing fight for equality in the workplace. make it defiant and uplifting
Write me a haiku about cherry blossoms falling in spring. Make sure to follow the traditional 5-7-5 syllable structure.
Can you create a ghazal in the Persian style? It should explore themes of love and longing, with the repeated refrain at the end of each couplet like traditional ghazals do.
I need a limerick with that classic Irish humor about a man from Dublin who loved to sing in pubs. Make it funny but keep it clean please!
compose a tanka poem in the japanese style about watching the moon reflect on a lake... should be 5 lines with the syllable pattern 5-7-5-7-7
Write a poem about the empty space in my bed where you used to sleep. Make it sad but not too depressing
I need a breakup poem that captures the feeling of relief mixed with sadness after ending a toxic relationship. Something bittersweet that acknowledges both the pain and the freedom.
can you help me write a short heartbreak poem? like 8 lines maybe? about seeing my ex with someone new and pretending i'm okay but i'm really not
Generate a powerful poem about heartbreak using metaphors of storms and weather. I want it to feel raw and emotional, describing how everything reminds me of them even though they're gone.
Write a poem for my daughter who just graduated from medical school. Make it inspirational and mention how proud we are of her dedication through all those long nights of studying.
I need a short, uplifting poem about finishing college that I can include in graduation cards. Something about new beginnings and chasing dreams would be perfect!
Can you help me write a poem celebrating my team's achievement? We just completed a major project that took 2 years and I want something that captures the feeling of accomplishment and teamwork
create a graduation poem from a parent's perspective watching their child walk across the stage. make it emotional but not too sappy
Write a poem about how smartphones have changed the way we connect with each other, maybe something that captures both the good and bad sides
Can you create a haiku about artificial intelligence?
I need a funny limerick about working from home and having zoom meetings all day. Make it relatable!

compose a free verse poem that explores the feeling of doom-scrolling through social media at 2am. i want it to be kind of melancholic but also beautifully written, touching on themes of isolation and digital addiction
Write a poem commemorating the fall of the Berlin Wall in 1989. Make it hopeful and emphasize the reunion of families.
I need a short commemorative poem about the moon landing in 1969. Can you capture the wonder and achievement of that moment?
compose a somber reflective poem about D-Day, June 6 1944. honor the soldiers who fought on the beaches of Normandy
Could you help me write a commemorative poem for the signing of the Declaration of Independence? I want something that captures both the gravity and the revolutionary spirit of July 4, 1776.
Write a short poem that includes the words 'moonlight', 'whisper', and 'forgotten'. Make it about nostalgia.
I need a haiku that uses the phrase 'broken glass' somewhere in it
Can you create a rhyming poem about nature that incorporates these specific words: cascade, emerald, symphony, and twilight? It should be at least 3 stanzas long.
hey can u write me a love poem but make sure to include the exact phrase "like stars colliding in the dark" somewhere in there? doesnt matter where just work it in naturally
Write a poem about the quiet moments of making coffee in the morning before everyone else wakes up
Can you create a short verse about the mundane beauty of commuting to work on the subway? I want something that captures both the tiredness and the humanity of it all.
I need a haiku about brushing teeth. Make it philosophical somehow lol

compose a poem that follows someone through their entire daily routine from sunrise to bedtime. include little details like checking their phone, feeding pets, making lunch, etc. make it feel both repetitive and meaningful at the same time
Write a dark poem about recurring nightmares where I'm being chased through an endless hallway that keeps getting narrower
Can you create a short, whimsical poem about a dream where everything is made of candy and the clouds are cotton candy? Make it rhyme please!
I need a haiku about the feeling of waking up from a nightmare and not being able to remember what scared you so much
compose a free verse poem about lucid dreaming. i want it to capture that strange feeling when you realize you're in a dream and suddenly have control over everything. make it mysterious and ethereal

Can you write a poem about my dad who just retired after 35 years as a teacher? I want to capture the bittersweet feeling of him leaving behind his classroom but also the excitement of this new chapter in his life.
I need a short, uplifting poem for my retirement party invitation. Something about closing one door and opening another, maybe 8-10 lines that rhymes?

Write a reflective poem about transitioning from a busy career woman to retirement. Include themes of identity, purpose, and finding new meaning when your job no longer defines you. Make it contemplative but hopeful.

hey can u help me with a funny retirement poem for my coworker Bob? he's been an accountant forever and always jokes about spreadsheets being his life lol. want something lighthearted that mentions golf and sleeping in

Can you write a poem inspired by the lyrics of 'Bohemian Rhapsody' by Queen? I love the dramatic shifts and the line 'Is this the real life? Is this just fantasy?' - capture that same sense of questioning reality
hey could you create a short poem based on the vibe of lo-fi hip hop music? something chill and melancholic that feels like studying at 2am while it's raining outside
Write me a poem that captures the essence of Beethoven's Moonlight Sonata. I want it to feel as haunting and beautiful as the music itself, with imagery that matches those rolling, dark piano notes.

I need a poem inspired by taylor swift's writing style in her folklore album... like make it tell a story about lost love with lots of nature imagery and that wistful nostalgic feeling she creates. maybe incorporate some references to august or cardigan?
